
II. Domain Name and API Key
======================


2.1 Production Environment
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
:Domain Name: https://baas.waas.group
:app_id: To be assigned
:rsa_wallet_pub: To be allocated

2.2 Test environment
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
:Domain Name: http://baas.cacheily.com
:app_id: 8ee3794a7e5bd188c6af4fd7dda191f3
:rsa_third_pub:

::

  

:rsa_third_prv:

::

  

:rsa_baas_pub:

::

  

============ ============= ===================================================
Type          Token Name       Accuracy
memo          SRM           decimals
non-memo         VLX          decimals
============ ============= ===================================================

Noteï¼š rsa_third_prv is a third-party application private key, which is mainly used to encrypt request parameters. If it is a production environment, rsa_third_prv is generated by the developer, and then the corresponding public key is provided to the platform. In order to simplify the developer connection process in the test environment, a set of third-party public and private keys and token names are directly provided here for developers to quickly connect.
